fields.name: header_hide_title
fields.label: Hide title in header?
fields.description: If checked, will only display the provided logo and not the text title in the header.

fields.name: footer_hide_title
fields.label: Hide title in footer?
fields.description: If checked, will only display the provided logo and not the text title in the footer.

fields.name: footer_orgs
fields.label: Footer Organizations
fields.description: List of logos to display in the footer, e.g. partners or sponsors

fields.name: footer_login
fields.label: Display Core Data and CMS login buttons in footer?

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
